data.title: Games like Sonic Boom: Shattered Crystal • Games similar to Sonic Boom: Shattered Crystal • RAWG
data.meta_description: Games similar to Sonic Boom: Shattered Crystal on RAWG ✔ Video game discovery site ✔ The most comprehensive database that is powered by personal player...
data.text:
Sonic Boom: Fire & Ice is a game developed by Sanzaru Games. It was originally released in 2016. It was published by SEGA. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG. You can play Sonic Boom: Fire & Ice on Nintendo 3DS. The game is sold via Nintendo eShop. Jenny Huang produced the game. It was directed by Bill Spence, Mat Kraemer and Tin Guerrero. Richard Jacques scored the game.

Conduit 2 is a game developed by High Voltage Software. It was originally released in 2011. It was published by SEGA. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG. You can play Conduit 2 on Wii. You can purchase the game on Nintendo eShop. Kevin Sheller produced the game. Ed Dulian scored the game.

SONIC FREE RIDERS is a game developed by Sonic Team. It came out on 04-11-2010. SEGA published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG. SONIC FREE RIDERS is available on Xbox 360. You can purchase the game on Xbox 360 Store. It was scored by Jun Senoue.

Sonic & All-Stars Racing Transformed is a family sports-racing game developed by Sumo Digital. It came out on 16-11-2012. SEGA published the game. Sonic & All-Stars Racing Transformed has a Metascore of 79, based on professional reviews. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG. Sonic & All-Stars Racing Transformed is available on Xbox One, iOS, PC and Nintendo 3DS. You can purchase the game on PlayStation Store, App Store, Xbox Store and Steam. It was scored by Richard Jacques.

Spore Hero is a game developed by Electronic Arts Montreal. It was originally released in 2009. Electronic Arts published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional". Spore Hero is available on Wii. The game is sold via Nintendo eShop. Winifred Phillips scored the game.

Super Stardust Ultra VR is an arcade game developed by Sony Interactive Entertainment. It came out on 10-10-2016. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional". You can play Super Stardust Ultra VR on PlayStation 4. The game is sold via PlayStation Store.

Rolo to the Rescue is an action game developed by Vectordean. It was originally released in 1993. It was published by Electronic Arts. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG. Rolo to the Rescue is available on Genesis.

ARMS is a fighting game developed by Nintendo. It was originally released in 2017. It was published by Nintendo. ARMS has a Metascore of 77, based on professional reviews. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended". ARMS is available on Nintendo Switch. The game is sold via Nintendo eShop. It was produced by Kosuke Yabuki. Kenta Sato, Masaaki Ishikawa and Shintaro Jikumaru directed the game. It was scored by Atsuko Asahi and Yasuaki Iwata.

Invasion from Beyond is an action game developed by Unique Development Studios and King of the Jungle. It was originally released in 1998. GT Interactive published the game. Invasion from Beyond is available on PlayStation.

Sesame Street: Once Upon a Monster is a family game developed by Double Fine Productions. It was originally released in 2011. Warner Bros. Interactive published the game. You can play Sesame Street: Once Upon a Monster on Xbox 360. You can purchase the game on Xbox 360 Store. Tim Schafer directed the game.

Men in Black - The Series: Crashdown is an action-shooter game developed by RuneCraft. It was originally released in 2001. Infogrames published the game. Men in Black - The Series: Crashdown has a Metascore of 59, based on professional reviews. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh". You can play Men in Black - The Series: Crashdown on PlayStation. It was produced by David T. Brown, Tina Scholefield-Nicholson and Tony Barkley.
